content: a simple little cardigan knit in one piece from the top 2x2 ribbing down with a cable twist along the raglan seams row 1 ws *p2 k2 repeat from * to last 2 st p2 sizing 0-6 months 6-12months 1-2 years 2-4 years 4- row 2 rs *k2 p2 repeat from * to last 2 st k2 6 years finish chest measurement 20 22 24 26 28 repeat these two row 1 2 2 2 2 more times yarn berroco vintage 52% acrylic 40% wool 8% nylon switch to larger needles 218yds per 100g or p one row cascade 220 100% wool 220yds per 100g or diamond pure wool superwash 100% superwash yoke wool 220yds per 100g 1 2 2 2 3 skeins set up row rs k 7 8 9 11 11 left front pm p1 m1r k2 m1l p1 pm k 4 4 6 6 6 left sleeve pm needles 4 0mm us6 and 5 0mm us 8 24 circular p1 m1r k2 m1l p1 pm k 20 22 24 28 28 back and set of four double points or long circular for pm p1 m1r k2 m1l p1 pm k 4 4 6 6 6 right magic loop sleeve pm p1 m1r k2 m1l p1 pm k 7 8 9 11 11 gauge 18 stitches and 24 row = 4 /10cm with larger right front 66 70 78 86 86 sts needles in stockinette set up row ws *p to marker sm k1 p4 k1 sm repeat other tools removable stitch markers cable needle from * three more times p to end of row stitch holders or scrap yarn darning needle raglan row a rs *k to 1 st before marker m1r k1 buttons sm p1 c2f p1 sm k1 m1l k to 1 st before next neckband marker m1r k1 sm p1 c2b p1 sm k1 m1l repeat from * once more k to end of row 8sts row 1 & row 2 instructions repeat from * three more times p to end of row from neckband for 1 5 raglan row c rs *k to 1 st before marker m1r k1 bind off all sts loosely in rib sm p1 k4 p1 sm k1 m1l k to 1 st before next sleeve marker m1r k1 sm p1 k4 p1 sm k1 m1l repeat from * once more k to end of row 8sts increased put 26 26 30 32 36 held sleeve sts back on larger raglan row d ws *p to marker sm
